products.title: Blanco
products.description:
TASTE

Sweet agave and vanilla, with undertones of tropical and citrus fruit

AROMA

Lemongrass, mild floral elements, chamomile and light minerality

BODY & COLOR

Brilliant platinum, light body

FINISH

Ultra smooth with a bright and crispy finish, notes of almond, key lime pie, and toasted coconut

WHAT MAKES IT SPECIAL

Rested in oak barrels for a fresh vanilla roundness

products.title: Reposado
products.description:
TASTE

Ripe roasted agave flavor with notes of caramel and vanilla

AROMA

Vanilla, meringue, honey, and fruit accents

BODY & COLOR

Straw color with golden hues and medium body

FINISH

Smooth caramel finish with notes of sweet cooked agave and pecan pie

WHAT MAKES IT SPECIAL

Rested in oak barrels, Blended with Extra Añejo

products.title: Anejo
products.description:
TASTE

Vanilla, sweet agave, and crisp herbal notes

AROMA

Caramel, toasted nuts, orange peel, chocolate and toffee

BODY & COLOR

Light amber with shiny golden reflections and bronze hues with full body

FINISH

Very long silk, rich and full bodied

WHAT MAKES IT SPECIAL

Blended with Extra Añejo, Aged for over 1 year in oak barrels

products.description:

Longer days and warmer weather are ahead. It’s time to throw on your 818 Dad Hat, this time in our favorite seasonal color.

Due to high demand, please allow 10 business days to receive your shipping notice and tracking number.

You asked. We answered. We've brought back a limited number of the 818 Dad Hat in our classic Piña green.

products.title: 818 Nalgene Bottle
products.description: 32 oz. Clear Tritan Nalgene with Lime top. Expertly crafted threads for leak‑proof hydration and a wide mouth that’s perfect for ice cubes or fruit infusions. Proven in the elements and ready to withstand even the most rugged conditions. A pioneer, for pioneers...for spirited encounters.

products.title: 818 Festival Cherry LA Baby Tee
products.description:
100% USA Cotton. This is a cut & sewed garment made in South Central Los Angeles. Garment dyed then washed for soft hand-feel.

Hand printed with water-based ink on front of white baby tee.

Model is 5'5" and is wearing a S. Please reference Cherry LA size chart for sizing.

products.title: 818 Festival Bandana
products.description: Our Dark Green 818 Festival Bandana. The accessory of the season.

products.title: 818 Phone Charms
products.description: Our limited edition 818 Phone Charm Set. Meet your new best friends.
